mapper.select: /* [RlestMapper.xml] [getRlestList] [매물 전체 리스트 불러오기] */ SELECT rlest_num , brkr_id , rlest_adr , rlest_sort , deposit , monthly_rent , maintenance_charge , room_area , structure , direction , floor , total_floor , parking_check , elevator_check , move_in_day , post_title , rlest_intro , trans_status_check , delete_status_check , crt_id , DATE_FORMAT(crt_dttm, '%Y. %m. %d') AS crt_dttm , upd_id , upd_dttm FROM real_estate WHERE delete_status_check = 0 ORDER BY trans_status_check DESC, crt_dttm DESC LIMIT #{offset} OFFSET #{limitStart}

/* [RlestMapper.xml] [getRlestDetail] [선택 매물 리스트 불러오기] */ SELECT rlest_num , brkr_id , rlest_adr , rlest_sort , deposit , monthly_rent , maintenance_charge , room_area , structure , direction , floor , total_floor , parking_check , elevator_check , move_in_day , post_title , rlest_intro , trans_status_check , delete_status_check , crt_id , DATE_FORMAT(crt_dttm, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS crt_dttm FROM real_estate WHERE rlest_num = #{rlestNum};

/* [RlestMapper.xml] [getWishList] [로그인한 사용자의 위시리스트 조회] */ SELECT r.rlest_num , r.brkr_id , r.rlest_adr , r.rlest_sort , r.deposit , r.monthly_rent , r.maintenance_charge , r.room_area , r.structure , r.direction , r.floor , r.total_floor , r.parking_check , r.elevator_check , r.move_in_day , r.post_title , r.rlest_intro , r.trans_status_check , r.delete_status_check , r.crt_id , DATE_FORMAT(r.crt_dttm, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS crt_dttm , w.email FROM real_estate r LEFT JOIN wish_list w ON r.rlest_num = w.rlest_num WHERE w.email = #{email};
/* [RlestMapper.xml] [getAboutOptions] [해당 매물에 옵션 목록 불러오기] */ SELECT ao.opt_num , o.opt_name FROM about_options ao INNER JOIN options o ON ao.opt_num = o.opt_num WHERE rlest_num = #{rlestNum};
